hooks.command: powershell -Command "[Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager, Windows.UI.Notifications, ContentType = WindowsRuntime] | Out-Null; $template = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastTemplateType]::ToastText01; $xml = [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::GetTemplateContent($template); $xml.GetElementsByTagName('text')[0].AppendChild($xml.CreateTextNode('Claude Code - 任务已完成')) | Out-Null; [Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotificationManager]::CreateToastNotifier('Claude Code').Show([Windows.UI.Notifications.ToastNotification]::new($xml))"
